original_title: Agalloch - The Silence of Forgotten Landscapes
overview: The Silence of Forgotten Landscapes is a 2009 live DVD by American metal band Agalloch. It features a 2008 performance by the band at the Biebob venue in Vosselaar, Belgium. It was co-directed by Juan Mosqueda and Agalloch frontman John Haughm.
title: Agalloch - The Silence of Forgotten Landscapes
